extendedInfo.description: m-parking is an easy and configurable parking fee payment interface.It allows you to super-quickly pay the parking without worrying about mistyping the zone number or your car registration. Essentially, it sends an SMS with your car registration to a dedicated zone number to initiate a parking fee payment (in supported areas).â Press reviews & raves:â¢ [Bug.hr] http://www.bug.hr/appdana/m-parking/168.aspxâ¢ [Mobil.hr] http://www.mobil.hr/novosti/zanimljivosti/m-parking-jer-placanje-parkinga-nikad-nije-bilo-lakse-4985â Features and benefits: âº Beautiful, yet simple user interface that puts the most important action - quick and accurate parking fee payment - into the spotlight âº Save on costly mistakes by not needing to remember the zone codes or your car registration anymore âº Save yourself from finding a parking meter or needing to carry small change âº Enjoy the super-fast, one-click, direct payment option âº ...or let the app prepare the payment so you can send it from your favorite SMS app âº Start quickly with automatic detection of current location for payment âº 208 countries to choose from âº Numerous fully configured countries with over 170 cities comprising of over 540 detailed zones, ready at the tip of your finger âº Even if your location is not among the many pre-configured ones, you're enabled to easily create your city and zones âº Multi-language support for the whole interface âº Be in control with interaction enhanced with sound, animation and vibration âº Snappy, performance-optimized interface âº Car registration printed on a beautiful license plate âº International car code stickers âº Free updates of content (cities and zones) âº There are absolutely NO ADS to annoy you and eat up your battery and bandwidth âº Enjoy the full functionality with ten complimentary payments and opt to unlock the unlimited version  (either buy the unlocker app or buy the key via PayPal)â Languages supported: â¢ Deutschâ¢ Englishâ¢ Hrvatskiâ¢ Ð±ÑÐ»Ð³Ð°ÑÑÐºÐ¸â Pre-configured locations (*):â¢ Bosnia and Herzegovina (http://www.dream-of-electric-sheep.com/tag/bosnia-and-herzegovina),â¢ Bulgaria (http://www.dream-of-electric-sheep.com/tag/bulgaria),â¢ Croatia (http://www.dream-of-electric-sheep.com/tag/croatia),â¢ Germany (http://www.dream-of-electric-sheep.com/tag/germany),â¢ Montenegro (http://www.dream-of-electric-sheep.com/tag/montenegro),â¢ Serbia (http://www.dream-of-electric-sheep.com/tag/serbia)(*) Follow the links to see which cities are pre-configured and to track released updates for that country.â Note regarding limitations:Please find details on the product page, linked below.â Note regarding possible errors:Please use the dedicated forum and email (listed below) to notify us about bugs. It guarantees quick and focused response and thus quicker resolution. On the other hand, if posted under Ratings, the eventual problem would probably be left unnoticed, leaving you with the problem unsolved.Feedback & ideas forum: http://bit.ly/m-parking_ideasFollow updates:â¢ Blog: http://bit.ly/m-parking_blogâ¢ Google+: http://bit.ly/m-parking_gplus

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: Love simplicity!!! I bought it and love it...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Najbolja
reviews.comment: Jednostavno super! Naspram HAK aplikacije, placanje ovom aplikacijom ide brzinom svjetlosti - jedan tap i gotovo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Korisno ako imas toliko automobila da im ne mozes popamtiti registracije, inace je brze i jednostavnije poslati poruku.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Odlicna aplikacija, ali ...
reviews.comment: SMS brojevi za Sarajevo nisu ispravni, bar sto se tice BH Telecom m-parking usluge. Treba da budu: Zona \342\200\2341\342\200\235 - 061 11 701   Zona \342\200\2342\342\200\235 - 061 11 702   Zona \342\200\2343\342\200\235 - 061 11 703
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jednostavno, lijepo i radi
reviews.comment: Par sekundi nakon instalacije, bez ikakvog posebnog podesavanja, vec sam mogao platiti parking. Izvrsno!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Najbolja parking aplikacija
reviews.comment: Isprobao sam sve aplikacije za pla\304\207anje parkinga i ova mi je najbolja! Radi stabilno i brzo. Ve\304\207 sam isprobao platiti parking u Osijeku i sve 5.
reviews.author: A Google User
